heading: James is all pro
text: Awesome multi-instrumentalist. Highly organized and his sessions, whether tracking or mixing, are just ready to go.

heading: The care and attention that was given to this process was life changing
text: I wanted a true collaborative effort in this process of artistic madness. And that was delivered beyond any expectation.

heading: No matter what kind of musical goop I give him, he sends back gold
text: As an independent artist with a full-time job, I rely on remote collaboration, and that’s been very easy with James.
by: Tim Duncan, Say No! To  Yes!

heading: I was absolutely blown away by his work
text: I was totally comfortable letting him do his thing, I knew he understood my vision and would work with me until we nailed it.

heading: Genuine quality at insanely affordable pricing
text: James’s natural leaning towards an authentic, live-performance capture of the music worked synonymously for the style and production value we aimed for.

heading: James brings a professional approach to mixing work
text: James’s technical expertise and quick turnaround times make him a valuable partner.
by: Liam McKay, Call the Next Witness
